snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court is meeting privately Thursday to determine how to respond to Argentina's appeal of lower court decisions ordering it to repay more than $1.3 billion in defaulted bonds....

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Meets to Discuss Argentina Debt Case
headline.main: Supreme Court Meets to Discuss Argentina Debt Case

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court is meeting privately Thursday to determine how to respond to Argentina's appeal of lower court decisions ordering it to repay more than $1.3 billion in defaulted bonds.
